The mission is simple: serve delicious, affordable food that guests will want to return to week after week.

528-min.en-US.js"},"squarespace-website-overlays-manager":{"css":"//assets.squarespace.com/universal/styles-compressed/website-overlays-manager-07ea5a4e004e6710-min.en-US.css","js":"//assets.squarespace.com/universal/scripts-compressed/website-overlays-manager-c988cad7a3816539-min.en-US.js"}},"pageType":2,"website":{"id":"55a3d439e4b01f2d8e5832b9","identifier":"jennifer-norton-73az","websiteType":1,"contentModifiedOn":1747143618991,"cloneable":false,"hasBeenCloneable":false,"siteStatus":{},"language":"en-US","translationLocale":"en-US","formattingLocale":"en-US","timeZone":"America/New_York","machineTimeZoneOffset":-18000000,"timeZoneOffset":-18000000,"timeZoneAbbr":"EST","siteTitle":"Edgewater
